solution_line_template: Job uses {house_land} + {reserved_land} + {cattle_land} = <<{house_land}+{reserved_land}+{cattle_land}={non_crop_land}>>{non_crop_land} hectares of land for non-crop purposes.
Thus he uses {total_land} - {non_crop_land} = <<{total_land}-{non_crop_land}={crop_land}>>{crop_land} hectares for crop production.
